Class DownData

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.game.data.DownData
public final class DownData extends Object
Passes the results of a down movement from game controller to GUI controller. Encapsulates whether any rows are cleared and the new viewdata of bricks.

  • Method Details

    • getClearRow

      public ClearRow getClearRow()
      Gets the result of the row clearing operation.
      Returns:
      a ClearRow object containing number of removed lines, score bonus and updated game board matrix after clearing bricks

    • getViewData

      public ViewData getViewData()
      Gets the latest view data for the falling and next bricks.
      Returns:
